args:
Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" .
Attorney General Pam Bondi called the corruption charges against New York City Mayor Eric Adams “the...
Attorney General Pam Bondi called the corruption charges against New York City Mayor Eric Adams “the weaponization of government” during a CPAC talk. She accused prosecutors of bringing charges to “make deportation harder.”
“It’s about ending their weaponization of the government and fighting violent crime and enabling cities like New York and mayors like Eric Adams to enforce Donald Trump’s immigration policies,” Bondi said.
